c1.name: At Water's Edge
c1.descriptionRaw:
While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=#FFD780FF>Nereid's Ascension</color>, the final Normal Attack in Sangonomiya Kokomi's combo will unleash a swimming fish to deal 30% of her Max HP as <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>.
This DMG is not considered Normal Attack DMG.
c1.description:
While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by Nereid's Ascension, the final Normal Attack in Sangonomiya Kokomi's combo will unleash a swimming fish to deal 30% of her Max HP as Hydro DMG.
This DMG is not considered Normal Attack DMG.

c2.name: The Clouds Like Waves Rippling
c2.descriptionRaw:
Sangonomiya Kokomi gains the following Healing Bonuses with regard to characters with 50% or less HP via the following methods:
路<color=#FFD780FF>Kurage's Oath</color> Bake-Kurage: 4.5% of Kokomi's Max HP.
路<color=#FFD780FF>Nereid's Ascension</color> Normal and Charged Attacks: 0.6% of Kokomi's Max HP.
c2.description:
Sangonomiya Kokomi gains the following Healing Bonuses with regard to characters with 50% or less HP via the following methods:
路Kurage's Oath Bake-Kurage: 4.5% of Kokomi's Max HP.
路Nereid's Ascension Normal and Charged Attacks: 0.6% of Kokomi's Max HP.

c3.name: The Moon, A Ship O'er the Seas
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Nereid's Ascension</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Nereid's Ascension by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: The Moon Overlooks the Waters
c4.descriptionRaw:
While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=#FFD780FF>Nereid's Ascension</color>, Sangonomiya Kokomi's Normal Attack SPD is increased by 10%, and Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.8 Energy for her.
This effect can occur once every 0.2s.
c4.description:
While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by Nereid's Ascension, Sangonomiya Kokomi's Normal Attack SPD is increased by 10%, and Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.8 Energy for her.
This effect can occur once every 0.2s.

c5.name: All Streams Flow to the Sea
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Kurage's Oath</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Kurage's Oath by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Sango Isshin
c6.descriptionRaw: While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=#FFD780FF>Nereid's Ascension</color>, Sangonomiya Kokomi gains a 40% <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG Bonus</color> for 4s when her Normal and Charged Attacks heal, or would heal, any party member with 80% or more HP.
c6.description: While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by Nereid's Ascension, Sangonomiya Kokomi gains a 40% Hydro DMG Bonus for 4s when her Normal and Charged Attacks heal, or would heal, any party member with 80% or more HP.
